name: Matering Basic Commands
objective: Understand and apply basic command-line commands to perform everyday tasks.

questoins: Open your terminal or command prompt in Desktop.
Use a command to display your current working directory
Create a new directory named CLI_Task.
Inside CLI_Task, create two more directories: MyDocs and Projects.
sections.hint: Use a command that begins with mk.

questoins: Navigate into CLI_Task.
List all the files and directories inside CLI_Task.
Now, navigate into MyDocs without leaving the current directory or typing the full path.
While still inside MyDocs, create an empty file named my_notes.txt.
Add the line "This is my first note." to my_notes.txt.
Display the contents of my_notes.txt to confirm the addition.
Now, append another line to my_notes.txt: "CLI commands are powerful."
Display the contents of my_notes.txt again to confirm the appended content.
Move my_notes.txt from MyDocs to Projects.
Verify the move by listing the contents of both directories.
Navigate to Projects and remove my_notes.txt.
Confirm the removal by trying to list or display the contents of my_notes.txt.
Without navigating out of the Projects directory, create a file inside MyDocs named challenge.txt and add the line "I completed the challenge!".
List the contents of MyDocs from within the Projects directory without navigating to MyDocs.

name: Save The Princess
objective: Understand and apply basic command-line commands to perform everyday tasks.

questoins: Open your terminal in Desktop, and create a main directory to represent the game world 'SaveThe Princess', then navigate into it
Create 3 subdirectories to represent the lcoations in the game 'Sea, Forest, Castle'

Create file in each location to represent the event in that location 
 -    Shark.txt in Sea 
 -    Lion.txt in Forest 
 -    Knight.txt in Castle 
 -    Princess.txt in Castle

Add description to each event, to give the user a clue or information about the enviroment 
 -    In Shark: You win 100hp or lose 40hp
 -    In Lion:  You win 90hp or lose 30hp 
 -    In Knight:  You win 120hp or lose 20hp 
 -    In Princess:  Thanks <3
Create player.txt in the game world with 100hp as a strat, make sure to add the hp inside player document

The player needs to cross all location in order to reach to the princess and save her
 -    Move the player to Sea
 -    list the events in Sea and fight them by flipping a coin 'heads = wins, tail = lose'
 -    After filipping the coin, read the event description to update the hero hp
Repeat the steps above in Forest with Lion, and in Castl with Knight
Read the Princess message and delete the player document

We are going to implement the same game as a web-application later in the course with help of
 -HTML 
 -CSS 
 -JavaScript
Stay around and enjoy the Journey :)
